document.full_text: syrian security forces fired live rounds on thursday at hundreds of protesters marching in a night demonstration in the southern city of deraa to demand the removal of president bashar al-assad, two witnesses said.
document.title: syrian forces fire on deraa protesters: witnesses
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces fired live rounds on thursday at hundreds of protesters marching in a night demonstration in the southern city of deraa to demand the removal of president bashar al-assad, two witnesses said.
